issue.title: [Rust] Travis fails due to formatting diff
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-2691](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-2691). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
There is a small formatting difference that makes master red: https://travis-ci.org/apache/arrow/jobs/389844420

`[~andygrove]` can you have a look at this?

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-2691?focusedCommentId=16507071) by Andy Grove (andygrove):*
`[~xhochy]` The formatting rules seem to have changed in the latest stable Rust release.

Here is a PR to hopefully resolve this: <https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/2126>

I'm on vacation and will be traveling today but will take a look later today to make sure this builds correctly on Travis

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-2691?focusedCommentId=16507154) by Uwe Korn (uwe):*
Issue resolved by pull request 2126
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/2126>
